statements: SELECT * FROM voting_history WHERE decision = 'approve';
SELECT id, decision FROM voting_history WHERE vote_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM voting_history WHERE decision = 'reject' ORDER BY vote_date DESC;
SELECT member_id, COUNT(*) FROM voting_history GROUP BY member_id;
SELECT id, decision, vote_date FROM voting_history ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT id, member_id, decision, vote_date FROM voting_history WHERE decision = 'Yes' ORDER BY vote_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM voting_history WHERE member_id = 123 ORDER BY vote_date ASC;
SELECT MAX(vote_date) AS latest_vote_date FROM voting_history;
SELECT member_id, COUNT(*) AS total_votes FROM voting_history GROUP BY member_id ORDER BY total_votes DESC;
SELECT decision, COUNT(*) AS decision_count FROM voting_history GROUP BY decision ORDER BY decision_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM voting_history WHERE voter_id = 1;
SELECT voter_id, decision_id, vote FROM voting_history ORDER BY vote_timestamp DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT voter_id, COUNT(decision_id) FROM voting_history GROUP BY voter_id;
SELECT member_name, role FROM governance_members WHERE join_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT AVG(role) AS average_role_length FROM governance_members;
SELECT * FROM voting_history WHERE voter_id = 1;
SELECT voter_id, decision_id, vote FROM voting_history WHERE decision_id = 5 ORDER BY voter_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT vote FROM voting_history WHERE vote_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT voter_id, COUNT(*) AS total_votes FROM voting_history GROUP BY voter_id HAVING total_votes > 10;
SELECT member_name, role FROM governance_members WHERE role = 'Chairperson' OR role = 'Vice Chairperson';
SELECT * FROM VotingHistory;
SELECT decision, voter_id FROM VotingDecisions ORDER BY vote_date DESC;
SELECT voter_id, vote_date, decision FROM VotingHistory WHERE decision='Yes';
SELECT * FROM VotingDecisions WHERE voter_id=1;
SELECT member_id, member_name, start_date FROM GovernanceMembers ORDER BY start_date;
SELECT * FROM VotingHistory WHERE decision = 'Approve' ORDER BY vote_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT voter_id, COUNT(*), MAX(vote_date) FROM VotingHistory GROUP BY voter_id;
SELECT v.voter_id, v.decision, d.outcome FROM VotingHistory v JOIN VotingDecisions d ON v.voter_id = d.voter_id WHERE d.outcome = 'Passed';
SELECT m.member_name, m.position, COUNT(v.voter_id) AS total_votes FROM GovernanceMembers m LEFT JOIN VotingHistory v ON m.member_id = v.voter_id GROUP BY m.member_name ORDER BY total_votes DESC;
SELECT * FROM VotingDecisions WHERE decision_id IN (SELECT MIN(decision_id) FROM VotingDecisions) ORDER BY vote_date LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM voting_history LIMIT 5
SELECT member_id, decision, vote_time FROM voting_history ORDER BY vote_time DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT DISTINCT decision FROM voting_history
SELECT member_name, join_date FROM governance_members ORDER BY join_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT decision_name, decision_description FROM decisions WHERE decision_date >= '2022-01-01' LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM voting_history;
SELECT member_id, decision FROM voting_history WHERE vote_time > '2022-01-01';
SELECT decision_id, decision_name, decision_description FROM decisions ORDER BY decision_date DESC;
SELECT member_name, total_votes FROM governance_members WHERE join_date < '2021-01-01';
SELECT member_id, COUNT(vote_id) AS total_votes FROM votes GROUP BY member_id HAVING total_votes > 5;
SELECT * FROM vote_history;
SELECT member_id, decision FROM vote_history WHERE vote_id > 100 ORDER BY vote_timestamp DESC;
SELECT decision_name, description FROM decisions WHERE decision_id = 1;
SELECT name, position FROM governance_members WHERE join_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM member_votes WHERE vote_choice = 'Yes' ORDER BY member_id ASC, decision_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM governance_members;
SELECT name, position FROM governance_members WHERE join_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT decision_name, description FROM decisions ORDER BY decision_id DESC;
SELECT v.member_id, v.vote_choice, vh.vote_timestamp FROM member_votes v JOIN vote_history vh ON v.vote_id = vh.vote_id;
SELECT a.log_id, a.action, m.name AS performed_by, a.performed_on FROM audit_log a JOIN governance_members m ON a.performed_by = m.member_id ORDER BY a.performed_on DESC;
